metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1587 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability was discovered in the PCRE2 library in the get_recurse_data_length() function of the pcre2_jit_compile.c file. This issue affects recursions in JIT-compiled regular expressions caused by duplicate data transfers.

criterions.comment: pcre2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
